title: Caught Screaming
description: IT'S HERE! The first PRINTED collection of poetry and illustrations by recording artist & poet Otep Shamaya. It can be downloaded as an electronic book OR you can order it in BOOK form that will be mailed to you.It can be purchased using Debit/Credit Card or PayPal account. CAUGHT SCREAMING includes over 140 pages of previously unpublished poems, private illustrations, & a blank diary section at the end of the book for buyers to add their own thoughts, poems, dreams, rants, & raves.BUY YOUR COPY TODAY!
author: Otep Shamaya
